title: BRIEF-Orbit Garant Drilling Reports Q4 Loss Per Share C$0.02

BRIEF-Orbit Garant Drilling Reports Q4 Loss Per Share C$0.02

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 18, 2019 17:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Orbit Garant Drilling Reports Q4 Loss Per Share C$0.02 Sept 18 (Reuters) - Forage Orbit Garant Inc : * ORBIT GARANT DRILLING REPORTS FISCAL 2019 FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE C$0.02 * Q4 REVENUE C$44.4 MILLION VERSUS C$44.5 MILLION * AS AT JUNE 30, 2019, COMPANY'S WORKING CAPITAL WAS $55.1 MILLION * OUR DECLINE IN GROSS MARGINS FOR QUARTER REFLECTS LOWER PRODUCTIVITY LEVELS ON CERTAIN CONTRACTS IN CANADA
